description: Unit test class for the TodoController, using MockMvc to test the REST API endpoints for todos in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: TodoControllerTest
classes.description: Test class for TodoController endpoints using Spring's MockMvc framework.

methods.name: create_success_shouldReturn201AndBody
methods.description: Tests successful creation of a new Todo and validation of the response payload.

methods.name: create_validationError_shouldReturn400WithErrors
methods.description: Tests validation errors when submitting invalid create requests.

methods.name: list_success_shouldReturn200AndArray
methods.description: Tests listing of todos, expecting an array of todo items.

methods.name: getById_notFound_shouldReturn404
methods.description: Tests the response when requesting a Todo by ID that does not exist.

methods.name: put_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Tests full update (PUT) operation on an existing Todo.

methods.name: put_missingTitle_shouldMapIllegalArgumentTo400
methods.description: Tests handling of IllegalArgumentException during PUT update.

methods.name: patch_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Tests partial update (PATCH) of a Todo.

methods.name: toggleComplete_shouldReturnUpdatedState
methods.description: Tests toggling the completion status of a Todo.

methods.name: delete_success_shouldReturn204
methods.description: Tests successful deletion of a Todo.
